Test Name: CXCR4 Mutation Analysis (Somatic) for Lymphoplasmacytic Lymphoma/Waldenstrom Macroglobulinemia
Specimen Type: Bone marrow aspirate, peripheral blood, or FFPE tissue sections
Purpose: To detect somatic CXCR4 gene mutations in patients with lymphoplasmacytic lymphoma/Waldenstrom macroglobulinemia for diagnostic and therapeutic guidance.
Container: EDTA or heparin tube for blood/bone marrow; FFPE tissue block or slides for tissue sections
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, thermocycler, real-time PCR (qPCR) or next-generation sequencing platform, DNA quantification instrument, gel electrophoresis setup
